alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:21PM MDT until June 16 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kit Carson County in east central Colorado... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 420 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Arriba, or 17 miles west of Flagler, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Flagler. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 391 and 408. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
